title: About - Leo Deng - leodeng.dev
aboutText1: Hi, I'm Leo Deng (a.k.a @leodenglovescode). A passionate full-stack developer with a love for fun & open-source projects, and all things tech-related. When I'm not coding, you'll find me tinkering with hardware (Arduino/Raspberry Pi/PC Building) or diving into the latest stuff about AI and web dev.
aboutText2: My Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (little to none), Python, React (Mostly AI experience), Node.js, and more.
aboutText3: Interests: AI, Web Development, Open Source, and Mini-Computers.
aboutText4:
Music Interests: Punk Rock, Rock, Alternative, Pop.
